title: World Atrial Fibrillation Awareness Day Successfully Commemorated Across the Globe
content:
KANSAS CITY, Kan. , Sept. 18, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- The "World Atrial Fibrillation Awareness Day" was commemorated on September 12 th across the globe. Several cities organized Atrial Fibrillation related awareness events.  AF Awareness Yoga sessions, Run/Walk programs took place in  Kansas City , Tulsa , Scottsdale, Little Rock , and Hyderabad with a focus on patient education, promoting research and access to better care. Global Atrial Fibrillation Alliance Foundation ( www.global-af-alliance.org ) has worked closely with several professional organizations, physicians and hospitals to bring the AF education to the forefront through World AF Awareness Day. It strives to create increased awareness amongst general public about this most common heart rhythm condition that affects more than 20 million people in the world and is a major cause of stroke, heart failure and heart attacks.
